fields.code:
from django.conf import settings
from datetime import datetime, timedelta
from migasfree.server.models import MessageServer
url = '/server_messages/'
msg = 'Message Server Delayed' 
t = datetime.now() - timedelta(0, settings.MIGASFREE_SECONDS_MESSAGE_ALERT)
result = MessageServer.objects.filter(date__lt=t).count()
alert = 'warning'
target = 'server'
fields.name: Server Messages Delayed

fields.code:
from django.conf import settings
from datetime import datetime, timedelta
from migasfree.server.models import MessageServer
url = '/server_messages/'
msg = 'Server Messages'
t = datetime.now() - timedelta(0, settings.MIGASFREE_SECONDS_MESSAGE_ALERT)
result = MessageServer.objects.filter(date__gt=t).count()
alert = 'warning'
target = 'server'
fields.name: Server Messages

fields.code:
from django.conf import settings
from datetime import datetime, timedelta
from migasfree.server.models import Message
url = '/computer_messages/'
msg = 'Computer delayed' 
t = datetime.now() - timedelta(0, settings.MIGASFREE_SECONDS_MESSAGE_ALERT)
result = Message.objects.filter(date__lt=t).count()
alert = 'warning'
target = 'computer'
fields.name: Computer delayed
fields.description: Check how many computers are delayed

fields.code:
from migasfree.server.models import Package
result = Package.objects.version(0).filter(Q(repository__id__exact=None)).count()
url = '/query/5/'
alert = 'warning'
msg = 'Package/Set orphan'
target = 'server'
fields.name: Package/Set orphan
fields.description: Packages that not have been asigned to a Repository.

fields.code:
from migasfree.server.models import Notification
result = Notification.objects.filter(checked__exact=0).count()
url = '/admin/server/notification/?checked__exact=0'
alert = 'warning'
msg = 'Notifications to check'
target = 'server'
fields.name: Notifications to check
fields.description: Server Notifications that must be checked

fields.code:
from django.conf import settings
from datetime import datetime, timedelta
from migasfree.server.models import Message
url = '/computer_messages/'
msg = 'Computer updating now'
t = datetime.now() - timedelta(0, settings.MIGASFREE_SECONDS_MESSAGE_ALERT)
result = Message.objects.filter(date__gt=t).count()
alert = 'info'
target = 'computer'
fields.name: Computer updating now
fields.description: Check how many computers are being updated at this time

fields.code:
from migasfree.server.models import Fault
from migasfree.middleware import threadlocals
from django.db.models import Q
result = Fault.objects.filter(checked__exact=0).filter(Q(faultdef__users__id__in=[threadlocals.get_current_user().id,]) | Q(faultdef__users=None)).count()
url = '/admin/server/fault/?checked__exact=0&user=me'
alert = 'danger'
msg = 'Faults to check'
target = 'computer'
fields.name: Faults to check
fields.description: Faults not marked as checked. You must mark the fault as checked when the fault is solved

fields.code:
from migasfree.server.models import Error
result = Error.objects.filter(checked__exact=0).count()
url = '/admin/server/error/?checked__exact=0&user=me'
alert = 'danger'
msg = 'Errors to check'
target = 'computer'
fields.name: Errors to check
fields.description: Errors not marked as checked. You must mark the error as checked when the error is solved
